summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 CHEVROLET EXPRESS 1500.  THE SEAT BRACKETS THAT HOLD THE SEAT TO THE TRACK CONSTANTLY BREAK, WHICH CAUSES THE SEAT TO BECOME OFF TRACK.  THE SEAT HAS BEEN REPAIRED TWICE; HOWEVER, THE FAILURE PERSISTS.  THE DEALER AND MANUFACTURER HAVE NOT OFFERED ANY ASSISTANCE.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 26,000 AND CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 37,474.   UPDATED 02-19-08 *BF
